data.eml:eml: The (almost) unknown Italian naturalist Raffaello Bellini (1874 - 1930): biography malacological publications, and status of his recent molluscan taxa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fasulo, Giuseppe, Duraccio, Sergio, Federico, Antonio, Crocetta, Fabio (2019): The (almost) unknown Italian naturalist Raffaello Bellini (1874 - 1930): biography malacological publications, and status of his recent molluscan taxa. Zootaxa 4668 (3): 343-369, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4668.3.3
